library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(readr)
```{r Dataloading}
data <-read_csv(here::here("dataset-ignore/raw_nba_data.csv"))
best_streaks <- data %>% group_by(player) %>% filter(season==2022,mean(minutes) >25)  %>% mutate(count_above_avg_pts=length(pts[pts>mean(pts)])) %>%ungroup() %>% head(25)
best_players <-data %>% group_by(player) %>% filter(player %in% best_streaks$player,season==2022)
games_abv_avg <- best_players %>% mutate(abv_pts=factor(pts>mean(pts)))
```

```{r plots}
ggplot(best_players) +geom_boxplot(aes(x=player,y=pts))+scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(n.dodge=4))
ggplot(best_streaks) +geom_point(aes(x=Team_Abbrev,y=count_above_avg_pts,color=player))
ggplot(games_abv_avg) +geom_point(aes(x=player,y=pts,color=abv_pts))+scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(n.dodge=4))
```
